i_fert_increase_if_pale_leaves.text_template: If you see pale leaves or pinholes, increase your fertilizer dose.

i_fert_start_half_dose_weekly.text_template:
Begin dosing your liquid fertilizer, but only use a **Half Dose** for now. 

**Why?** Your plants are waking up, but full dosing combined with the ammonia you are adding can trigger algae. We will increase to full strength after the cycle.

t_fert_dose_full_weekly_transition.text_template: Increase to **Full Fertilizer Dose**. {{doses.fertilizer_micros.fertilizer_micros_ml_week_start}} mL of {{products.fertilizer_micros.display_name}}.

t_fert_dose_maintenance_weekly.text_template: Dose {{doses.fertilizer_micros.fertilizer_micros_ml_week_start}} mL of {{products.fertilizer_micros.display_name}} (adjust based on plant growth).
